name: The vampire fell to the bottom of the tower, flooded with blood
name_original: The vampire fell to the bottom of the tower, flooded with blood
description:
Hardcore platformer where you will often die on behalf of the main character - a vampire trying to get out of the first floor of a high tower flooded with blood. Beautiful backgrounds, 8-bit nostalgic music and sophisticated obstacles will not let you get bored for at least one evening.

Game controls

A - move left.

D - move right.

Space - jump.

Team

Max Potashev - game design, project management.

Evgeniy Ivanov - programming, game design.

Danil Tikhomirov - music, sound design.

Anjy Svech - digital art.

Mikhail Tarasov - digital art, animation.

Tarasova - digital art.

Special thanks - Solo.
